summary: Hi!! I love your writing, but I've just been too shy to do a request for anything. Can I request something for Shinso?? Okay so...
question: Hi!! I love your writing, but I've just been too shy to do a request for anything. Can I request something for Shinso?? Okay so like his S/O gets one of those monthly skin care boxes, and it has like a set of 3 animal face masks (they're so cute!)... Look, I'm not sure what I'm asking for, but I kinda want Shinso to wear a cat sheet mask that looks like a cat... And they just talk while they wait for their 15 minutes to be up.... I'm sorry if this is confusing, I'm bad at explaining things 🙃
answer:
hey, it’s okay anon this is good and thankyousomuch!!

His tired eyes, the staggeringly attractive eyebags that lay beneath, his soft, indigo hair which usually was kept up now has fallen downwards framing his face angelically. Shinsou’s looks never failed to capture you in complete awe.

These were just a handful from the long list of handsome features that Shinsou Hitoshi possessed. But today, they couldn’t compare to his current look.

“Shinsou,” you say, tilting his face up towards your line of sight. “You look so adorable!”

You were met with the sickeningly sweet image of your boyfriend’s face concealed by an animal-themed face mask. Shinsou was seated on a chair before you so that you could properly put on his facial mask, due to your height difference. 

The design of the product was supposed to resemble a cat, and seeing that it best resembled Shinsou you strongly advocated for him to put it on. The whiskers, the fake blush, it all came together so well.

He glanced at you with his amused, amethyst eyes, and arched an eyebrow at your spontaneous statement. 

He looked like a cute, smug kitten.

You couldn’t fight the urge to squeal in adoration and softly press your lips against his. Although it seems hard to sneak in a kiss because of the limited space that the masks offered, you manage.

“Do I?” He asks after you pull away from him. “I can’t even move a muscle on my face.” 

You laugh lightly, however, it sounded forced because you were mindful of the fact to not ruin the state of your own facial mask. “That means it’s working! Don’t worry though, we only have five minutes left and then we get to take these off.”

Shinsou sighs and leans the side of his face into the warm touch of your palm. His cheek smushes up against it while he takes this as the opportunity to shut his eyes and ponder.

“Ah, I can’t wait to take these off,” you murmur, carding your fingers through the tufts of his hair. “I don’t think I can last much longer without feeling the need to kiss all over your smooth, clear face!”

Almost immediately, Shinsou tears the beauty treatment off and tosses it to the side. He throws his arms around your torso so that he may bring you closer, urging and tugging you down to fulfill your previous comments. “See? It’s off now. The wait is over.”

Despite your giggles, you make frail attempts to move away. “Shinsou, there were still a few minutes! You can’t just do that!”

“I can and I did.”

summary: What did you and the gf get up to for valintines?
question: What did you and the gf get up to for valintines?
answer: Stayed in and cuddled! She got me a necklace and some chocolate covered strawberries, and I bought her a stuffed animal and a big bag of candies and chocolates. It was a simple day but we had fun!

body:
oh shit! a bnha oc!

(left: villain outfit, middle: school uniform, right: hero outfit)

she’s a simple blue gal and her quirk is basically just weather control. she can pinpoint exactly where she wants it to rain, and where she doesn’t, and how hard.
